Package mines

Class Board.MinesAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • mines.Board.MinesAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    Board
    private class Board.MinesAdapter
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    Handles the mouse events for the game board panel. This class extends MouseAdapter and implements the logic for handling left and right mouse clicks on the game board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      private MinesAdapter()

    • Method Detail

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Overrides the mousePressed method of MouseAdapter class to handle mouse press events on the panel. Gets the clicked cell column and row from the MouseEvent object. Checks whether it is a left or right click and calls the appropriate method to handle the click
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mousePressed in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        Parameters:
        e - the MouseEvent object representing the mouse press event

      • cellLabelLeftClicked

        private void cellLabelLeftClicked​(int cellIndex)
        Handles a left mouse click event on a cell in the game panel. Uncovers the clicked cell and updates the game panel.
        Parameters:
        cellIndex - the index of the clicked cell

      • cellLabelRightClicked

        private void cellLabelRightClicked​(int cellIndex)
        Handles a right mouse click event on a cell in the game panel. Marks the clicked cell with a flag to indicate it might have a mine and updates the statusbar to show the remaining mines.
        Parameters:
        cellIndex - the index of the clicked cell

      • checkWining

        private void checkWining()
        Checks if the player has won the game. If all mine cells are marked and the rest are checked, updates the statusbar to announce the win.

      • gameOver

        private void gameOver()
        Ends the game and shows the final result by uncovering all cells. Updates the statusbar to announce the loss.
